message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $80. Would you like to explore the opportunity to own it? My initial offer is $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $90 for the product.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $105 for the product.
